channel.title: Checkbank command-- Cant check person with space in name

item.title: Checkbank command-- Cant check person with space in name
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank") && c.playerRights >= 3) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ", 2); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Checkbank command-- Cant check person with space in name

item.title: Checkbank command-- Cant check person with space in name

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I released this on the Snippets section.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ", 2); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } } catch(Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

item.title: Checkbank command-- Cant check person with space in name
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

Title says it, i can check peoples bank, but i cant check bank if they have a space in their name: heres my code

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } }
any help?
